handist.collections.glb

Class GlobalLoadBalancer

  • java.lang.Object
    • handist.collections.glb.GlobalLoadBalancer

  • public class GlobalLoadBalancer
extends Object
    Class presenting the static method under which GLB operations can operate. Programmers may choose to statically impoirt this class to avoid the lengthy GlobalLoadBalancer#underGLB(SerializableJob) call in their program.
    Author:
    Patrick Finnerty

    • Method Detail

      • getPreviousLog

        public static DistLog getPreviousLog()
        Returns the DistLog containing the information logged during the previous underGLB(SerializableJob) method call.

        The logs are returned in their non-gathered state, meaning the entries are still distributed across all hosts. Call method DistLog.globalGather() on the returned DistLog instance to gather all the logs on the caller host.

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Triggers the erasure of all tracking information on every host.

        Experimental. Can only be called safely if there are no ongoing GLB computation.

      • start

        public static void start()
        Helper method used to launch the computations staged into the global load balancer. Is non-blocking and allows progress within the underGLB(SerializableJob) method to continue after this method is called.

        You would only need to call this method if you have some tasks other than the GLB computations that should be executed concurrently. In such a situation, stage the various GLB operations by calling their collection.GLB.method() and setup the potential GlbFuture.after(GlbFuture) completion dependencies between them. Then, call this method. In the remainder of the ongoing block, you may lay out the other activities that should run while the GLB computations previously staged are being computed in the background.

      • underGLB

        public static ArrayList<Exception> underGLB(DistLog logger,
                                            apgas.SerializableJob program)
        Method to call to launch a GLB program. A single call to this method can be made at the time. If a second call is made while a program is under way, this second call will be blocked.
        Parameters:
        logger - existing DistLog into which the logged events of the GLB will be kept
        program - program to launch under GLB
        Returns:
        collection of all the Exceptions that occurred during the glb program

      • underGLB

        public static ArrayList<Exception> underGLB(apgas.SerializableJob program)
        Method to call to launch a GLB program. A single call to this method can be made at the time. If a second call is made while a program is under way, this second call will be blocked.
        Parameters:
        program - program to launch under GLB
        Returns:
        collection of all the Exceptions that occurred during the glb program
